shortInfo.name: Yuri Ivanov
shortInfo.profSummary: 17  year  of  experience  in  IT  industry.  Worked  as  java  developer,  front-end  developer,    java  team  lead  , java solution architect and  project  manager.    Successful  development  of  many  java  back-ends  for  web  sites,  mobile  application.  Result  oriented,  structural.  Like  simple  and  clear  solutions.  Good  cooperation  with  team.
